categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: Doctor Jekobra was a male Givin scientist who worked for the Galactic Empire, developing many sinister innovations for the authoritarian regime. During the Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector by the Empire, a young smuggler from Burnin Konn organized an attack on Jekobra's laboratory to try and steal the Givin's latest work.
